name: WP Yelp Review Slider
author: LJ Apps

sections.description:
Show off your Yelp reviews on your WordPress site! Check the video below to see how you can get Yelp reviews displaying in under 2 minutes!

A great way to build user confidence and increase your page SEO! You work hard for your 5 star Yelp reviews, why not easily display them on your WordPress site? Each review has the Yelp logo so that your customers can see the reviews are coming from Yelp. Let’s face it, no one really trusts reviews unless they have social proof. Having Yelp reviews on your site builds user confidence and helps you make more sales!

Here’s a quick video adding Yelp reviews in under 2 minutes.

If you have a restaurant you know how important Yelp reviews can be. Yelp may have started with just restaurants, but now they have all sorts of businesses. If you have a great rating on Yelp, then it’s a great idea to display the reviews on your site. By showing social proof from Yelp you can build customer confidence and increase your sales.

If you don’t have any Yelp reviews, then don’t worry it’s pretty easy to get started. More than likely your Business is already listed. All you have to do is starting sending your customers there to leave a review.

Feature List:

  • Easily create a slider from your Yelp reviews! Sort of like an image slider but with Yelp reviews!
  • Filter reviews by rating to only show your best reviews!
  • Simple to enter the Yelp URL and click the download button to copy your reviews to your database.
  • You can create multiple templates to use all of over your site. They can be used in Posts, Pages, and Widgets!
  • They can also be added with a template function.
  • Control what reviews get displayed on which slider with options such as: show/hide star rating, show/hide date, change the border radius, modify the colors and background.
  • Create a grid of reviews buy changing how many to show per a row and even have mutliple rows of reviews!
  • Even more control of the display by using the custom CSS input box.
  • Display them by newest or randomly.
  • Even hide the no text reviews completely with the click of a button.
  • Add a read more link and even change the text of it.

Check out our other free versions!
Facebook
Google
TripAdvisor
Thumbtack
WooCommerce
Airbnb

Upgrade to Pro for More Features:

  • Download all your reviews from multiple locations and social pages.
  • Super cool graphs and charts.
  • Customer support via email and a forum.
  • Get email notifications when new low reviews are found.
  • Create a really cool summary badge of your reviews!
  • Front end submission form.
  • Download your reviews from 85+ sites like… Facebook, Google, TripAdvisor, WooCommerce, Zillow, etc…
  • Create floating badges and reviews that will show a slideout of reviews on click!
  • Load More button to show more reviews.
  • Hide certain reviews from displaying.
  • Manually add reviews to your database.
  • Download all your reviews in CSV format to your computer.
  • Slider pauses when mouses is over it.
  • Access more Review Template styles!
  • Advanced slider controls like: Autoplay, slide animation direction, hide navigation arrows and dots, adjust slider height for each slide.
  • Change the minimum rating of the reviews to display. Allows you to hide low rating reviews.
  • Use a minimum and maximum word count so you can hide short or long reviews.
  • Add a read more and read less link to long reviews.
  • More date display options (MM/DD/YYYY, DD/MM/YY, DD/MM/YYYY, YYYY-MM-DD, DD Mmm YYYY, Time Since)
  • Display reviews of a certain type or mix them all together on one slider (Facebook, Yelp, Google, TripAdvisor, manually input).
  • Individually choose which reviews you want to display per a template.
  • Display a summary of your review ratings in a Google Search Result. You can automatically create the correct review snippet markup!
  • Access to all new features we add in the future!
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-fb-reviews folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Look for the WP FB Reviews menu item in your admin.
sections.faq:
How do I request a new feature?

We are always looking for features to add. Just post on the support forum or contact us on the bottom of this page.

sections.screenshots:
1. Create a beautiful review slider on your posts or pages! More styles available in Pro version.

  2. Lots of customizable options. Even input CSS if you want.

  3. All your reviews show up in a list.

  4. Even use it on your sidebar!

  5. Create as many templates as you like.
sections.reviews:
Love it!

By leticiaimora on January 12, 2024

Very easy to use and love it so far.

Great plugin

By carrieontheweb on December 21, 2022

I use this for all my clients. It's a great plugin!!

Perfect!

By markyeoj on November 18, 2022

Had a little problem at first but the developer quickly fixed it. And its working perfectly!! Thank you so much!

Works Great

By nettechy on March 18, 2022

It's nice to have a plugin that works the first time installed and configured, this is one of them and it works great.

Nice plugin!

By bfg4hhbmotorsport on October 8, 2021

it's easy and works with my website. thank you!

No Issues With This Plugin

By genb84 on October 6, 2021

I installed this plugin on one of my client's websites a few years ago and have yet to run into any issues. It's simple and I like simple.

Yelp Slider

By mikemoody on January 22, 2021

Cool little tool and it just works!

5 stars

By evergreenforest on September 22, 2020

Works great. Simple to start

Does what is supposed to do

By Eugene Grant-Sinclair (lamountainllc) on August 7, 2020

Very flexible, easy to use and configure. Doesn't load down to page speed. Very satisfied with it.

Easy to use and setup!

By kemars on July 11, 2020

great product and great to spread your review content throughout your site!

short_description: Create a Yelp review slider! Allows you to easily display your Yelp business reviews in your Posts, Pages, and Widget areas.
